column1: American workers and #SmallBiz deserve better than the Democrats' political games.   By refusing to say yes to critical #COVID19 relief Speaker Pelosi is prioritizing a radical wish list over the needs of American families.  #FL15   It’s time to reopen #PPP funding! https://t.co/vDN6vKjxy8
